App Description: Moody – Mood dan Activity Helper
 Moody is a simple app that helps users log their daily moods
and provide activity recommendations based on mood percentages and activity preferences.
 Users can:
 Write a short diary
 Enter mood as a percentage (0–100%)

Choose the type of activity (Sport / Relax)
The app supports 2 languages (Indonesia dan english), and can run in light and dark modes.

 Key Features:

 1.Daily Mood Check
 Users can input their mood percentage each day and add personal notes to record their feelings or important events that happened.
 2.Automatic Activity Recommendations
 Based on mood and activity preferences (active like exercise, or relaxed like entertainment), Moody suggests suitable activities. These suggestions are designed to help you stay motivated, focused, and emotionally balanced.
 3.Share Your Results with Friends
 After receiving activity suggestions, users can share their mood results and recommendations directly to WhatsApp or other social media platforms with just one click.
